function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of medical care apps may lead to misdiagnosis or incorrect treatment due to lack of physical examination.","Impact":"Inaccurate treatment, delayed recovery, potential spread of the disease.","Mitigation":"Ensure apps emphasize the importance of in-person consultations for accurate diagnosis and treatment, and provide guidelines on when to seek in-person care.","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms that enable virtual consultations with healthcare professionals.","People":"Patients, public.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, app developers."},{"Description":"Inaccurate detection of disease spread through mobile apps leading to false positives and unnecessary self-isolation.","Impact":"Unwarranted self-isolation, anxiety, and disruption of daily activities.","Mitigation":"Develop and implement more accurate technology for disease spread detection, and provide clear guidelines for interpreting app results.","Technologies":"AI-based disease detection algorithms, improved proximity tracking using Bluetooth technology.","People":"General public, individuals using the apps.","Owner":"Tech developers, healthcare organizations."},{"Description":"Reliance on educational apps for e-learning may result in decreased interaction and engagement, leading to reduced learning outcomes.","Impact":"Poor educational achievement, lack of skill development, decreased motivation for learning.","Mitigation":"Provide training and support for educators to improve online teaching methods, and encourage interactive and engaging content on educational apps.","Technologies":"Interactive video conferencing tools, collaborative virtual classroom platforms.","People":"Students, educators.","Owner":"Educational institutions, app developers."}]}
